Key Match Events: Trent Grisham hit a solo home run off Clayton Kershaw
Fernando Tatis crushed a ball to center field with a runner on base off Dodgers reliever Brusdar Graterol
Cody Bellinger extended his arm over the centerfield fence and made a grab to end the inning
Manny Machado took exception to Graterol's celebration
Trent Grisham stared down Kershaw when he began his trot to first
Jurickson Profar took exception to a pitch Dodgers starter Gavin Stone threw in the fifth inning
Profar and Dodgers catcher Will Smith exchanged words
Manny Machado tossed a ball toward the Dodgers' dugout
Fernando Tatis gave San Diego a 1-0 lead with his homer in the first inning
Jurickson Profar robbed Mookie Betts of a home run
Jack Flaherty exchanged words with Manny Machado
Manny Machado tossed a ball toward the Dodgers' dugout
Pre-Game Insights: Manny Machado said 'No disappointment. We're in the postseason. We're going to see them in a few weeks.'
Post-Match Reflections: Mookie Betts isn't surprised that the series with the Padres will come down to one last game
Manny Machado's toss to the dugout caused the Dodgers to send tape of the incident to Major League Baseball
Manny Machado said 'I don’t know his intent. I don’t want to speak for him'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres won their wild-card series matchup over the New York Mets
The Padres made a late-season surge to possibly steal the NL West from the Dodgers
The Padres settled for a wild-card spot, but Machado knew a playoff battle with its division rival was on the horizon
Others: The Padres swept the Atlanta Braves in two games in the wild-card round
The Dodgers took Game 1 with Shohei Ohtani stamping his mark in the rivalry
